segments.text: That sink is overflowing with dirty water, what a gross mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor—filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, her shoe probably ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate that might have been in that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, reaching into the cookie jar with who knows what on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's in the puddle area; their feet could be wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies mixed with potential water damage—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window brings in fresh air, but inside it's nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost smell the dampness from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is so unappetizing and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting for a soggy cookie? No thanks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It turns my stomach seeing the waste and sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
